title: Can't Reconnect to my game HELP ME!!!!!!!!!!!
body: I was in a match and it did the attempting to reconnect thing so i left the game trying to see if i could just load back in but now i can't even see my game and i can even que for a new match whats going on?

replies.body:
I've noticed quite a lot of players having issues with packet loss today, particularly with Bell, Comcast, and Rogers. It'd be a good first move to check for that by using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan those network logs from a game that couldn't reconnect. 

Grab a screenshot of what it shows and link it here that way I can go over it with you to see how we should proceed!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UfGGgKqz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-08T00:32:42.499+0000)
>
> I've noticed quite a lot of players having issues with packet loss today, particularly with Bell, Comcast, and Rogers. It'd be a good first move to check for that by using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to scan those network logs from a game that couldn't reconnect. 
> 
> Grab a screenshot of what it shows and link it here that way I can go over it with you to see how we should proceed!

I wish i could but the game is not showing up in my match history.
